sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import setDateFormat from '../../utility/setDateFormat'; const Styled = styled.div``; const PersonFacts = ({ data }) => { return (

Personal Info

Know For

{data.known_for_department}

Gender

{data.gender === 1 ? 'Female' : 'Male'}

Know Credits

{parseInt(data.combined_credits.cast.lenght) - 1 + (parseInt(data.combined_credits.crew.lenght) - 1)}

Birthday

{setDateFormat(data.birthday)}

Place of Birth

{data.place_of_birth}

Official Site

{data.homepage ? data.homepage : '-'}

Also Know As

{data.also_known_as}
); }; export default PersonFacts;
